com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartstore.store

Class SoupSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartstore.store.SoupSpec

  • public class SoupSpec
extends java.lang.Object
    Object representation for soup specifications, such as soup name and features.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String[] ALL_FEATURES
      List of all possible features for building soup_attrs table

      Soup features

    • Constructor Detail

      • SoupSpec

        public SoupSpec(java.lang.String soupName)
        Creates a soup spec without any features.
        Parameters:
        soupName - Name of the soup that will be used to store data.

      • SoupSpec

        public SoupSpec(java.lang.String soupName,
                java.lang.String... features)
        Creates a soup spec with the given features.
        Parameters:
        soupName - Name of the soup that will be used to store data.
        features - List of features that this soup should implement.

    • Method Detail

      • getFeatures

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFeatures()
        Returns the features that are implemented by the soup represented in this soup spec.
        Returns:
        A list of features represented by Strings that this soup implements.
